setting.name: log-dir
setting.label: Logging directory
setting.description: This is the path to where the log file for this server application will reside. The default, if this attribute is not defined, is the current working directory of the server application.

setting.name: log-level
setting.label: Logging level
setting.description: The logging level for the servers log / trace facility.

setting.name: log-to-console
setting.label: Log to console
setting.description: If set, logging / trace information will also be directed to the console as well as to a file. The default is not set.

setting.name: udp-port
setting.label: UDP port
setting.description: The UDP port that this server will bind to.

setting.name: tcp-port
setting.label: TCP port
setting.description: The TCP port that this server will bind to.

setting.name: rtp-port
setting.label: RTP port
setting.description: The starting RTP port that this server will bind to.

setting.name: tls-port
setting.label: TLS port
setting.description: The TLS port that this server will bind to.

setting.name: presence-monitor-port
setting.label: Presence monitor port
setting.description: The port that the ACD Agent Presence Monitor will bind to.

setting.name: presence-server-uri
setting.description: The URI to the Presence Server which provides sign-in / sign-out services for ACD Agents.

setting.name: administrative-state
setting.description: The desired Administrative State of this server. Note: In order to transition between ACTIVE and STANDBY states, it is necessary to follow with a restart action.

setting.name: operational-state
setting.description: This is the actual Operational State of the server.
